state

Class GraphicElementMoveState

  • java.lang.Object
    • state.GraphicElementState
      • state.GraphicElementMoveState

  • public class GraphicElementMoveState
extends GraphicElementState
    Move tool state.
    Author:
    geomaster

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<GraphicElementMoveShapeCommand> commands
      List of commands that move all shapes in the selection.
      private GraphicElementCompositeCommand compositeCommand
      Composite command that moves all shapes in the selection.
      private GraphicElement element
      Element to act upon.
      private Point lastPoint
      Last point where the mouse was dragged.

      • Fields inherited from class state.GraphicElementState

        view

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicElementMoveState(GraphicElement element, GraphicCanvasView view)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enter()
      Initializes a composite command based on the current selection.
      void mouseDown(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Picks the shape under the cursor (unless it is part of the current selection, in which case the whole selection will be moved) and initializes the composite command to move only that one.
      void mouseDrag(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Performs the translation of the shape(s) and updates the commands with the new positions.
      void mouseMove(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Highlights the shape under the cursor.
      void mouseUp(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Invokes the command to change the position of all affected shapes.

      • Methods inherited from class state.GraphicElementState

        leave, mouseClick

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
